message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $900000, which I think is a fair and reasonable offer considering its value to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $850000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle from my original offer, which was $900000.
